static SeparableConvolutionFilter edu.ou.asgbook.filters.SeparableConvolutionFilter.boxcar ( int  numx,
int  numy 
) [static] 

00092                                                                        {
00093         double[] coeffs_x = new double[numx];
00094         double[] coeffs_y = new double[numy];
00095         for (int i=0; i < numx; ++i){
00096             coeffs_x[i] = 1.0/numx;
00097         }
00098         for (int i=0; i < numy; ++i){
00099             coeffs_y[i] = 1.0/numy;
00100         }
00101         return new SeparableConvolutionFilter(coeffs_x, coeffs_y);
00102     }

static double [] edu.ou.asgbook.filters.SeparableConvolutionFilter.gauss ( int  numx  )  [static] 

00108                                           {
00109         double[] coeffs = new double[numx];
00110         double sigmax = numx / 6.0; // 3-sigma on either side
00111         for (int i=0; i < coeffs.length; ++i){
00112             double x = (i - coeffs.length/2.0)/sigmax;
00113             coeffs[i] = Math.exp(-(x*x));
00114         }
00115         return coeffs;
00116     }

int  numy 
) [static] 

00104                                                                       {

00106     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.filters.SeparableConvolutionFilter.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00118                                                             {
00119         // create output directory
00120         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("separable");
00121         
00122         // read input
00123         LatLonGrid popdensity = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, new GlobalPopulation.LogScaling()).crop(900, 2500, 200, 200);
00124         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "orig", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00125         
00126         // boxcar
00127         {
00128             SeparableConvolutionFilter filter = SeparableConvolutionFilter.boxcar(5, 5);
00129             LatLonGrid sm = filter.smooth(popdensity);
00130             KmlWriter.write(sm, out, "boxcar", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00131         }
00132         
00133         // gauss
00134         {
00135             SeparableConvolutionFilter filter = SeparableConvolutionFilter.gauss(11, 11);
00136             LatLonGrid sm = filter.smooth(popdensity);
00137             KmlWriter.write(sm, out, "gauss", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00138         }
00139     }

LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.filters.SeparableConvolutionFilter.smooth ( final LatLonGrid  input  )  

00039                                                     {
00040         int[][] inData = input.getData();
00041         final int nx = input.getNumLat();
00042         final int ny = input.getNumLon();
00043         
00044         // filter the rows
00045         final int hx = coeffs_x.length / 2;
00046         int[][] rowResult = new int[nx][ny];
00047         for (int j=0; j < ny; ++j){
00048             for (int i=hx; i < (nx-hx); ++i){
00049                 double tot = 0;
00050                 double wt = 0;
00051                 for (int m=-hx; m <= hx; ++m){
00052                     double coeff = coeffs_x[m+hx];
00053                     int inval = inData[i+m][j];
00054                     if (inval != input.getMissing()){
00055                         tot += inval*coeff;
00056                         wt += coeff;
00057                     }
00058                 }
00059                 if ( wt > 0 ){
00060                     rowResult[i][j] = (int)( Math.round(tot / wt) );
00061                 }
00062             }
00063         }
00064         
00065         // now filter the columns of rowResult
00066         inData = rowResult;
00067         LatLonGrid output = LatLonGrid.copyOf(input);
00068         output.fill(output.getMissing());
00069         final int hy = coeffs_y.length / 2;
00070         int[][] outData = output.getData();
00071         for (int i=0; i < nx; ++i){
00072             for (int j=hy; j < (ny-hy); ++j){
00073                 double tot = 0;
00074                 double wt = 0;
00075                 for (int n=-hy; n <= hy; ++n){
00076                     double coeff = coeffs_y[n+hy];
00077                     int inval = inData[i][j+n];
00078                     if (inval != input.getMissing()){
00079                         tot += inval*coeff;
00080                         wt += coeff;
00081                     }
00082                 }
00083                 if ( wt > 0 ){
00084                     outData[i][j] = (int)( Math.round(tot / wt) );
00085                 }
00086             }
00087         }       
00088         
00089         return output;
00090     }
